text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's been a few days since I arrived<n>at Tracen Academy as
a trainer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Now that I have my own office, I can<n>go through these
materials in pea—

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Whew, sweet paradise! No one ever<n>comes here, and it's
quiet to boot. Not<n>to mention there's a comfy couch<n>here
for me to sink right into!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Now then, without further ado...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Wait a sec! What're you doing here?!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Hey now, this empty office is my<n>precious afternoon snooze
spot—hm?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
That badge you got there... Are you a<n>new trainer? Lemme
guess, they told<n>you this room was all yours?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Okay, okay, I get it now. So that's<n>how it is. Goootcha.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Anyways, I'll be borrowing this<n>couch, mkay? Classes
today were<n>real tough, so I need to catch up on<n>some Z's.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: And with that, I bid you good night.

Without even waiting for a reply,<n>Seiun Sky plops herself
onto the couch<n>and starts snoring.
choice_data_list: (I guess she had a really rough day...)
(I guess she had a really rough day...)

text_block_list.text:
I decide to cover her with one of the<n>office's spare blankets
so she<n>doesn't catch a cold.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Yawn... Another great nap...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Wait, who are you?!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Haha, just a joke. Thanks for the<n>blanket, by the way.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Still... Just wondering, but why didn't<n>you wake me up?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
I pretty much confessed that I'd been<n>using this empty
room to play hooky.<n>On top of that, I started snoozing right<n>
in front of you.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
This is kinda weird coming from me,<n>but I'm pretty sure a
normal person<n>would've kicked me out ASAP, you<n>know?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
So why did you let me sleep this long,<n>going so far as to
cover me with a<n>blanket?
choice_data_list: I thought you might've been tuckered out...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Hm-hm... I see.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: So that's how it is! Well, thanks for<n>the nap! ♪

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
I'll definitely return the favor... That is,<n>whenever I
remember to.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Anyhow, toodle-oo. See you around. ♪
Seiun Sky says her goodbye and<n>promptly leaves the office.
A few days later...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Ah! There you are! Hey you, the new<n>trainer from last time!
We've got<n>trouble—it's an emergency!
choice_data_list: What's gotten you all shaken up?
What's gotten you all shaken up?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
I said we're in a crisis, so forget<n>about the details and
answer me this!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Yes or no question: is it correct to<n>assume that lung
capacity affects a<n>racer's stamina?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Say it like you mean it! I'm not<n>looking for a maybe, I need a
bold,<n>confident answer!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Okay, from the top!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: You're getting the spirit! One more<n>time: yes or no?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
So anyways, Teach, this is the person<n>I asked to be my new
trainer. Right?

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text:
I was wondering why you ran off like<n>that, but I see now.
Very well.

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text:
Well then, Trainer, I wish you luck<n>with Sky. Really, good
luck training her.<n>I'll be rooting for you two!

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text: And Seiun Sky, congratulations on<n>finding yourself a trainer.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Haha, I appreciate it. Then I'll catch<n>you later, Teach.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: And there you have it!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
You and I are now officially joined as<n>trainee and trainer.
Cue the applause!<n>Clap, clap, clap.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Whoa now, easy on the slander. Igave you a yes-or-no question—you said yes.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
More importantly, I knew that you<n>were the one destined to
be my<n>trainer! Won't you accept my<n>feelings?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Huh? You're really gonna make me<n>say it?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: It was love at first sight! Hehe! ☆

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
...For the record, that was a joke. But<n>that whole shebang in
your office last<n>time really left a positive impression<n>on
me.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Alsooo, I'm sure this isn't a bad deal<n>for a trainer as green
as yourself!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Of course. After all, being my trainer is<n>easy!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
See, I won't ever ask for extra<n>training! No personalized
routines! If<n>it's more work for you, it ends up<n>being more
work for me.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Done is better than perfect, right? It's<n>my personal
philosophy that each<n>shortcut taken is extra progress<n>
gained long-term.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
What I'm saying is, just sit back and<n>relax. Let's take it
easy and work as<n>hard as we want to. Woo!
...She totally tricked me into this<n>agreement!
Today is my first day of training with<n>Seiun Sky.
Bzzz, bzzz!

Noticing my phone going off, I check<n>my notifications and
find...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
"Trainer, I've got big news! There's<n>a whole school of fish
by the river<n>bank! I can't call myself a fisherman<n>if I miss
this chance!"

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: "P.S. I'm skipping training today.<n>Sincerely, Seiun Sky ☆"
She really ditched our first day of<n>training...
